HERO.TITLE: Full Stack Software Engineer
HERO.SUBTITLE_1: Building scalable platforms with Angular 18+, Node.js and MongoDB, creating hybrid solutions oriented to high availability.
HERO.SUBTITLE_2: My focus is on Clean Architecture and extreme optimization for high-volume environments.
HERO.SUDO_ERP: Creator of SUDO ERP, an Offline-First platform with real-time synchronization.

ABOUT.TITLE: My Engineering Philosophy
ABOUT.TEXT_1: I understand software development as a strategic business tool, not just a technical task. My differential value lies in the ability to translate commercial objectives into resilient architectures that scale with demand.
ABOUT.TEXT_2: Beyond code, I focus on long-term maintainability, resource optimization, and end-user experience. I firmly believe that a robust system is one that works invisibly and efficiently, allowing the business to grow without technical friction.

TECH_STACK.TITLE: Tech Stack & Architecture
TECH_STACK.SUBTITLE: Strategic selection of robust tools to build critical, scalable, and high-performance digital ecosystems.

FRONTEND.TITLE: Frontend & Desktop Ecosystem
FRONTEND.DESC: Development of complex reactive interfaces and native desktop applications, focusing on fluid user experience and optimized performance.

BACKEND.TITLE: Backend & Data Layer
BACKEND.DESC: Building robust and scalable APIs. Design of hybrid data schemas (SQL/NoSQL) and use of advanced Aggregations for efficient processing.

ARCHITECTURE.TITLE: Architecture, DevOps & Security
ARCHITECTURE.DESC: Quality assurance and operational continuity through decoupled architectures, security strategies (JWT), and resilient synchronization for critical environments.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Featured Projects
PROJECTS.SUBTITLE: A selection of works that demonstrate my ability to solve complex problems with cutting-edge technology.

SUDO.TITLE: SUDO ERP: Critical Management Ecosystem
SUDO.DESC: Comprehensive enterprise resource planning platform designed to operate in low-connectivity environments. Implements a custom bidirectional synchronization engine ensuring data integrity between branches and the cloud.

CARD_1.TITLE: Dental Practice Management System
CARD_1.DESC: Comprehensive clinical platform featuring OAuth 2.0, auth, RBAC role management, and MercadoPago integration. Includes an intelligent chatbot and admin dashboard with real-time reporting.

CARD_2.TITLE: Petit Salon - Digital Experience
CARD_2.DESC: Conversion-focused UX/UI design and frontend development. Digital brand strategy with Google Analytics integration and Core Web Vitals optimization.

CARD_3.TITLE: Microservices Architecture
CARD_3.DESC: Distributed system design for high scalability, implementing asynchronous communication patterns and centralized gateways.

EDUCATION.TITLE: Education & Certifications
EDUCATION.SUBTITLE: A blend of academic rigor in Computer Science and continuous technical specialization in modern technologies.

UNIVERSITY.INSTITUTION: Faculty of Engineering - National University of Jujuy
UNIVERSITY.DESC: Rigorous training in software engineering. Focus on Complex Algorithms, Data Structures, Design Patterns (OOP), and Relational/NoSQL Databases.

CONTACT.TITLE: Let's Start the Conversation
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: I am available to discuss Full Stack Engineering opportunities, system architecture, or technical consulting. Have a complex challenge? Let's talk.

FEEDBACK.TITLE: Professional Endorsements
FEEDBACK.SUBTITLE: Feedback from colleagues and clients I've had the pleasure of working with.
